蜙字的基本解释

蜙
zhōng
古同“蚣”。

蜙字的汉语字典释义

[①]［gōng］
［《廣韻》古紅切，平東，見。］
见“蜈蚣”。
[②]［shōng］
［《廣韻》職容切，平鍾，章。］
［《集韻》思恭切，平鍾，心。］
亦作“蜙1”。亦作“蜙2”。
见“蚣2蝑”。

蜙字的康熙字典解释

【申集中】【虫字部】　蜙； 康熙笔画：14； 页码：页1085第30
【唐韻】息恭切【集韻】思恭切，?音淞。【玉篇】蟲名。【爾雅·釋蟲】蜤螽，蜙蝑。【疏】一名蜙蝑，一名蜙䗥，一名??。陸璣云：?箕卽??，蝗類也。【酉陽雜俎】蜙蝑股鳴。餘詳螽字註。　又【集韻】蘇叢切，音?。義同。　或作?、蚣。

蜙字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
蜙字的起名意思

暂无。

Pith
Basic explanation of words
Pith
zhōng
Ancient with "蚣".
Pith
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［gōng］
["Guangyun" Gu Hongqi, Pingdong, see. ]
See "Centipede".
[②]［shōng］
["Guangyun" job title cut, Ping Zhong, chapter. ]
["Jiyun" thinking respectfully, flat bell, heart. ]
Also known as "Hydra 1". Also known as "Pigeon 2".
See "蚣2蝑".
Pith
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Shenzhen Collection] [Insect Character Department] 　蜙; Kangxi Strokes: 14; Page Number: Page 1085 Page 30
[Tang Yun] Xi Gongqie 【Jiyun】Thinking respectfully cut,? Yinsong. 【Jade articles】Insect names. 【Erya·Release insects】Crimson chrysanthemum, Cichlid worm. [Sparse] One scorpion, one scorpion, and one scorpion. Lu Jiyun: Kei 卽??, locusts too. 【Youyang Miscellaneous】Phyme screams. Yu Xiangzhi's note.　[Jiyun] Su Congqie, sound?. The same meaning.　Or as?, 蚣.
